attributes.action: facilitate a change in electoral law to allow a photograph of a candidate on an election ballot paper should the candidate concerned request it.  We believe this will aid democracy and decrease the opportunity for unnecessary confusion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that government should enable our electoral system to operate in a more open way in the interests of democracy.   We believe adding a further identifier to ballot forms in the form of photographs would be one small but significant step towards removing unnecessary confusion - e.g. in the case of candidates and parties with similar names, or where there may be multiple independents.
